hc.server.util

Class Assistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • hc.server.util.Assistant

  • public class Assistant
extends Object
    the assistant of current project is implemented by project provider, which process voice command.

    if you don't want to implement a assistant, and hope HCAI (HomeCenter AI) to do same work for you, please see detail on onVoice(VoiceCommand).
    Since:
    7.47
    See Also:
    ProjectContext.registerAssistant(Assistant)

      • getProjectContext

        public final ProjectContext getProjectContext()

        Returns:

      • onVoice

        public boolean onVoice(VoiceCommand cmd)
        process a voice command.

        please don't implement voice command for following cases, server will do it for you :
        1. the voice is for open/execute menu items.
        2. the voice is to open CtrlResponse, and the key words of status of CtrlResponse are included in voice. (open once is required)
        3. the voice is to open HTMLMlet, and the key words of JLable(s) or tool tip text of JComponent are included in voice. (open once is required)

        Important :
        1. assistant instance serve only one session at same time (synchronism).
        2. no all clients support all languages voice command.
        3. server will try to process voice for you instead of writing codes here, which is based on analysing the AnalysableRobotParameter between Robot and UI, so it is NOT recommended to use complex object defined by yourself in Robot.operate(long, Object).

        How to more effectively help the server understand the relationship between UI and Robot, to enhance the automatic processing of voice instruction accuracy?
        1. set keywords by JComponent.setToolTipText(String)
             for example, there are two project on server, one for ice box, and other for air conditioner. when people speaks "what is the temperature of ice box?", of cause the voice command should NOT be dispatched to air conditioner, server need more information about project for ice box, if there is a keywords "ice box" in menu, text field/label of form, server can be sure it does right, but if there is no keywords in form, but icons or ScriptPanel in form, you should set keywords by JComponent.setToolTipText(String).
             Important :
             set tool tip text for locale of current session, NOT for all locales, because different locale means different lucene analyzer.
        2. implements business in Robot.operate(long, Object)
             business may be driven from UI (voice assistant, HTMLMlet and Dialog), so it is good practice to implement business in Robot.operate(long, Object).
        3. use the AnalysableRobotParameter instead of complex object defined by yourself.
        Parameters:
        cmd -
        Returns:
        true means the voice command is consumed and never be dispatched to other projects.
